item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: A Software Developer’s Take: Coding, Tech Shenanigans, and a Dash of Ranting. Hello readers! This is my first ever blog post. I’m excited to start sharing my thoughts and perspectives with you all. As I begin this blogging journey, I wanted to give you an idea of the types of topics I plan to cover. Software Development and Technology As a software engineer, I will likely focus many posts on software development and technology in general.
